name: Around the World in Ten Seconds
name_original: Around the World in Ten Seconds
description:
For Spacespy's game jam on the theme "Ten seconds", I present you this small mini-game. No shooting, no killing, just navigation in orbit around this small planet for which you take care.

The human space army has been destroyed, you're the last soldier. You've been informed that aliens might attack sooner or later and it will be very quick: in less than 10 seconds, they can take control of the planet. Your goal is to patrol constantly to discourage the attack.

While you take care of them, the humans might send technology in orbit, try to avoid the satellites as much as possible.

This game is played with the arrow key:

UP = speed up [W]

DOWN = slow down [S]

LEFT / RIGHT = turn left / right [A / D]

Sorry, I made the game in a hurry, so no music, no sound, no nice story
